title: The TRUTH About Fantasy WRs: Part 2 + Jason’s Promises - Fantasy Football Podcast for 2/3
description:
The Fantasy Footballers are back with a new episode!! On today’s fantasy football podcast, the WR deep dive continues, as we seek the TRUTH about the 2021 fantasy season. Consistency ranks, boom/bust performances, and tons more! Plus, big NFL News including the Washington Commanders! Manage your redraft, keeper, and dynasty fantasy football teams with the #1 fantasy football podcast. -- Fantasy Football Podcast for February 3rd, 2022.
(04:10) - NFL News (Washington Commanders, Brian Flores)
(11:05) - The TRUTH About Fantasy WRs: Part 2
(14:20) - Hunter Renfrow
(19:20) - DK Metcalf & Tyler Lockett
(24:50) - Michael Pittman Jr.
(28:00) - Jaylen Waddle
(32:35) - CeeDee Lamb & Amari Cooper
(37:55) - D.J. Moore
(43:35) - Brandin Cooks
(48:15) - Marquise “Hollywood” Brown
Connect with the show:
Subscribe on YouTube
Visit us on the Web
Support the Show
Follow on Twitter
Follow on Instagram
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
